name: AntiVirus
description:
Flying through cyberspace circa 1989, defending against viruses which are on the attack.

My first game using Game Maker and created in one week.

Happy for any feedback about the game.

I created the game and all the graphics.

Sound effects came from freesfx.co.uk: http://www.freesfx.co.uk

Music track 'On and On' by VYVCH: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/VYVCH
